audioText: Cette nomination prestigieuse porte son nom aux quatre coins du monde académique et transforme le corps professoral de l'université tout entière.
question: What impact did the prestigious nomination have?
options: It spread his name throughout the academic world and transformed the entire university faculty
It increased the university's research funding significantly
It attracted more international students to the institution
It established new partnerships with foreign universities
explanation: The text states 'Cette nomination prestigieuse porte son nom aux quatre coins du monde académique et transforme le corps professoral de l'université tout entière' - This prestigious nomination carries his name to the four corners of the academic world and transforms the entire university faculty. This targets 'nom' and 'corps' in an academic excellence context.
